name: places/ChIJf9XkPuH1wokR1bjDHJHLPRA
adrFormatAddress: 2326 1st Ave., New York, NY 10035-3603, USA

originalText.text: Went there because my car hit a pothole on the FDR, was advised by the tow truck that I could only bring the vehicle there. I asked him what the damages were and he advised that he would not know until Monday. Monday came, he never contacted me. I requested for the insurance to take my vehicle to another location. He then advised of $ 250.00 storage fee for the 18 hrs my car was there because I “did not give him a chance” and when the insurance instructed him to give up the vehicle he proceeded to speak in his language and acted as if he did not hear the request. Long story short he had to be threatened with the police. He is a horrible human being.

originalText.text:
Went in to have some expensive work done come out needing more work. Not only do they deny causing my new problem they refuse acknowledge it saying they couldn't find anything wrong.
I must have looked rich to these  to these thieves because my final price was $300 more than original quote. Then had the nerve to say come back if you need anything else.
Save your money and go elsewhere this place is not for gringos.

originalText.text: The worst place for the ny state inspection. they force you to make some kind of service in the car in the processes, if you not do it you have to pay $ 40 dollars anyway for the inspection car fail
